# Ottawa - GDR

> Ottawa - GDR is an Ottawa-based garage door repair and installation company. We provide same-day garage door services including spring replacement, opener repair, cable repair, and new door installation across all Ottawa neighbourhoods. Licensed, insured, 5.0 Google rated; we arrive in under 90 minutes and offer 24/7 emergency service.

## Contact

- **Phone:** (613) 617-4238
- **Email:** info@ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca
- **Address:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
- **Website:** https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca

## Services

We offer the following garage door services in Ottawa:

- [Spring Replacement](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/spring-replacement) — Torsion and extension springs; same-day; $220–350
- [Opener Repair & Installation](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/opener-repair) — All brands; from $195
- [Opener Gear Replacement](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/opener-gear-replacement) — From $250
- [24/7 Emergency Repair](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/emergency-repair) — Under 90 min; from $199
- [New Door Installation](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/new-door-installation) — Steel, wood, glass; $1,800–4,500
- [Cable Repair](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/cable-repair) — Both cables replaced; $170–250
- [Panel Repair](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/panel-repair) — From $170
- [Weatherstripping & Insulation](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/weatherstripping) — From $250
- [Maintenance Tune-Up](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services/maintenance-tune-up) — 21-point inspection; $150

[View all services](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/services)

## Service Area

We serve all of Ottawa and surrounding areas, including Kanata, Barrhaven, Nepean, Orleans, Stittsville, Gloucester, Manotick, Westboro, Glebe, and more.

- [All service areas](https://ottawagaragedoorrepair.ca/areas)

## Key Information

- **Response time:** Under 90 minutes everywhere in Ottawa
- **Hours:** Same-day service 7 days a week; 24/7 emergency
- **Warranty:** 1 year on repairs; 5 years on new door installation
- **Pricing:** Written quote before any work; upfront pricing; no hidden fees
- **Licensed & insured:** Ontario licensed; $2 million liability
